metadata.title: Giantex Patio Lounge Chairs for Pool Area, Outdoor Chaise Lounger with 6 Adjustable Position Smooth Wheels and Quick-Drying Fabric, Lawn Recliner for Backyard, Garden Sunbathing Chair (1, Brown)
features: ☼☼6 Position Adjustable Backrest: This outdoor recliner features 6-position adjustable backrest so that you can easy to find the suitable angle for optimal comfort, greatly meeting your different requirements, such as reading, sunbathing or taking a nap. You can easily adjust it through adjustment brackets on the back.

☼☼Breathable Fabric: When you lie on this patio lounge chair, the breathable and quick-drying fabric will give you maximum comfort. Even in the hot summer, you won't feel stuffy either with breathable design. Besides, the fabric also has a quick-drying feature that fits outdoors.

☼☼Sturdy Construction: The frame of this adjustable chaise lounge with sturdy back support and reinforced triangular structure is constructed of heavy duty steel frame with powder coated, which makes it anti-rust. Therefore, this chaise lounge chair brings sturdy support while withstanding the outdoor environment. Meanwhile, the anti-slip foot pads add extra stability.

☼☼Effortless Movement to Different Places: Vary from common outdoor chaise lounge chairs, this patio lounge recliner is equipped with 2 smooth wheels so that you are able to move it wherever you want, such as garden, poolside, backyard and other places. It will always blend with outdoors because of the modern design.

☼☼Simple to Assemble: Included with detailed instruction and necessary accessories, this outdoor sunbathing chair is easy to install for time-saving. Overall dimension: 75”/74”/72”/67.5”/65” x 24” x 13.5”/20”/26”/31”/34.5”/38” (L x W x H), weight capacity: 330 lbs.
description: Description:
Start your leisure time from this adjustable chaise lounge!

The quick-drying and rustproof steel make this outdoor recliner not only comfortable and safe for you to lie down, but also suitable for the outdoor environment. What’s more, there are 6-level backrest adjustments that allow you to adjust the most comfortable angle for different needs. If you want to move this patio lounge chair to another place, the 2 smooth wheels will help you a lot.
Features:
Heavy duty steel frame with anti-rust surface for steady performance
